scripts.cleanAndroidCache: cd android/; ./gradlew clean; cd ../; yarn cleanWatchman;
scripts.clearAndroid: yarn cleanModules; yarn cleanAndroidCache;  yarn android; yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.clearIos: yarn cleanModules; cd ios/; pod deintegrate; pod install; cd ..; yarn cleanWatchman; yarn ios; yarn start --reset-cache
scripts.linkDevice: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081; adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090
